channel.title: Zerkscapers 508 v.1.8 update
channel.description:
[size=14pt][b]508 Client/server download.
POST IF U WATCHED/DOWNLOADED :][/size]
Futures:[/b] [i]Client with IP changer. (2 mirrors) Working pvp with specs Lots of things. All skillcape emotes/emotes [/i] [b]Credits:[/b] [i]Palidino Me Some tuts [/i]
[size=12pt][b]DOWNLOADS:[/size]
[u]Client Mirror[/u] Use Any 508 client
[i]Server mirror :[/i] [url=http://up.ht/NaeUwG]http://up.ht/NaeUwG[/url]
[i]Item id list:[/i] [url=http://uppit.com/DWGMWW]http://uppit.com/DWGMWW[/url]
_______________________________________________________________ PICTURES! _______________________________________________________________ [img]http://i282.photobucket.com/albums/kk280/mattias_bucket/clientwithipchanger.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i282.photobucket.com/albums/kk280/mattias_bucket/1-2.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i282.photobucket.com/albums/kk280/mattias_bucket/2-2.jpg[/img]

___________________________________________________________________________________________ [b]TO MAKE YOURSELF ADMIN:[/b] [i]Open Login.java [/i][u]search for:[/u]
[code] if (p.username.equals("r x")) { p.rights = 2; }[/code]
[b]Change R X to your name. ____________________ Enjoy post if u watched![/b]
